title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 501.4 - Computation of Assessment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 501.4 - Computation of Assessment

State Regulations

The total annual assessment for an institution shall be the
sum of its Supervisory Component and its Regulatory Component. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
501.4

Amended

New

York State Register February 20, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 07, eff. 1/31/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
